modName: Frost and Solitude Horses White Retex
summary: This changed the textures of Frost and Solitude Horses and optional the saddle texture
descriptionHtml:
- When Creation tool is there i will make Frost and sadle retextures seperet , Frost will become a unique horse from those in Solitude.

- So for now this will change the Solitude horses and Frost into a more fit to the name Frost white horse, also tryed to remove the blocky parts. When using the sadle textures, all sadles inworld will change untill CK is finaly there.

- These textures are made for my personal taste, if you do not like them,just don\'t use them ;)







If you do not like the saddle just remove the textures from the folder, right path C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\textures\\actors\\horse

saddle.dds
saddle_n.dds

Place the folder into the Data folder Skyrim

Right path: C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim

Do not forget to hit archive validation button in fomm

If you do not use Nexus FommThen 
kopy these lines into your archive validation file

data\\textures\\actors\\horse\\horse01.dds
data\\textures\\actors\\horse\\horse01_n.dds
data\\textures\\actors\\horse\\horsemanetail02.dds
data\\textures\\actors\\horse\\horsemanetail_n.dds
data\\textures\\actors\\horse\\saddle.dds
data\\textures\\actors\\horse\\saddle_n.dds


Remove :

C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\textures\\actors\\horse


horse01.dds
horse01_n.dds
horsemanetail02.dds
horsemanetail_n.dds
saddle.dds
saddle_n.dds


-----------------
Update
----------------

29 December 2011
Horse:
Minemized seams 
made horsefur less bright
eye patches less dark
more blocky parts removed

Sadle wolf fur : 
metal parts are silver now like the leopard fur
author: Xazomn
